creator: sachinmathias@yahoo.com
text:
I am not able to create functions, stored procedure and not able to  execute 
PL/SQL block using SQL in ant  script.

This works just fine. 
You just need to specify the usage of a delimiter other than ";" I use ";;"
And then write:

    function A .....
    begin
     .....
    end;
    ;;

    function b ......

and so on.
creator: j_a_fernandez@yahoo.com

text:
Enhancements were made to the SQL task earlier this year (bug#10719) to allow 
users to load stored procedures, packages, functions, triggers, etc, without 
loosing the formatting. Please seek assistance from user@ant.apache.org mailing 
list.
creator: riznob@hotmail.com
